review.title: “Somwhere [Sanver] to NoWhere. . .”
review.pros: Pros – A chilled out environment as long as there is no one to pull you by your hairs to get your brain racking on something that is completely oblivious to you.
review.cons: Cons – Uses their employees to do office 'Kitchen' chores.There is no training sessions held to groom you better on newer products.The list is endless. Do not even read this review. It is that worse.
review.advice-to-management: Advice to Senior Management – There is no management in existence. Just a one man show.
